Returns: the corresponding video resolution string. null if the resolution string is not defined for the given video format.
Parameters: String: The video format defined in @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels_E@. Value is @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_240P_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_360P_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_480I_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_576I_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_576P_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_720P_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_1080I_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_1080P_E@, @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_2160P_E@, or @B_android#media#tv#TvContract#Channels#VIDEO_FORMAT_4320P_E@
getVideoResolution(java.lang.String).Description: Returns the video resolution (definition) for a given video format.

ClassDesc: Column definitions for the TV channels table.
